name: Vivid Cruise
description: This is the second game I have released and I am excited to have you all play it and hopefully enjoy it. Vivid Cruise is a simple infinite runner game with an '80s/ Cyberpunk theme to it.  If you have never seen an infinite runner-type game the goal is to go as far as possible without dying. If you see any bugs or think something should be changed let me know down in the comments, please. Have fun!
